author: chirino
msg: - BTree leaf nodes are now linked for efficient iteration purposes.
- Added an iterator() method to the Index interface.

author: maartenc
msg: FIX: HTTP Handlers ignore unsuccessful response codes (IVY-864) (thanks to James P. White)

author: doll
msg: the poBox and extendedAddress fields on the address object have been removed. containers should now put that information into streetAddress which can be multiline.
the address.unstructuredAddress field is now address.formatted.

author: lacton
msg: Created a BuildfileTask to compute when the buildfile was last modified, helper files included (e.g., build.yaml)

author: kclark
msg: rb: Speed up Struct#initialize for optional fields [THRFIT-112]
Struct#initialize previously walked over every field and checked for
default values before assigning nil. The new approach assigns defaults
only to fields that have defaults, and lets Ruby handle nil ivars.
